references.paper_title: Learning generative models with invariance to symmetries
references.reason: This paper introduces the Symmetry-aware Generative Model (SGM), the core focus of the main paper, and its method for learning symmetries.

references.paper_title: Disentangling and learning robust representations with natural clustering
references.reason: This paper provides foundational work on disentangling representations, a key concept for understanding and improving the SGM's ability to capture data symmetries.

references.paper_title: Learning invariances in neural networks from training data
references.reason: This paper is highly influential in understanding and implementing invariance learning, which is directly relevant to the approach taken in the SGM.
This seminal paper lays groundwork on incorporating group theory and equivariance into neural networks, a core element of the SGM's theoretical foundation.
This work is critical for understanding and applying variational inference techniques, which are crucial to the learning algorithm used in the SGM.
